name: AD Groups Or Users Enumeration Using PowerShell - PoshModule
description:
Adversaries may attempt to find domain-level groups and permission settings.
The knowledge of domain-level permission groups can help adversaries determine which groups exist and which users belong to a particular group.
Adversaries may use this information to determine which users have elevated permissions, such as domain administrators.
query: (winlog.event_data.Payload:/.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Aa][Dd][Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Cc][Ii][Pp][Aa][Ll][Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp][Mm][Ee][Mm][Bb][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ii][Pp].*/ OR winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:/.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Aa][Dd][Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Cc][Ii][Pp][Aa][Ll][Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp][Mm][Ee][Mm][Bb][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ii][Pp].*/ OR (winlog.event_data.Payload:/.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Aa][Dd][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr].*/ AND winlog.event_data.Payload:/.*\-[Ff]\ .*/ AND winlog.event_data.Payload:/.*\-[Pp][Rr]\ .*/ AND winlog.event_data.Payload:/.*[Dd][Oo][Ee][Ss][Nn][Oo][Tt][Rr][Ee][Qq][Uu][Ii][Rr][Ee][Pp][Rr][Ee][Aa][Uu][Tt][Hh].*/) OR (winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:/.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Aa][Dd][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr].*/ AND winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:/.*\-[Ff]\ .*/ AND winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:/.*\-[Pp][Rr]\ .*/ AND winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:/.*[Dd][Oo][Ee][Ss][Nn][Oo][Tt][Rr][Ee][Qq][Uu][Ii][Rr][Ee][Pp][Rr][Ee][Aa][Uu][Tt][Hh].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.Payload:*get\-ADPrincipalGroupMembership* OR winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:*get\-ADPrincipalGroupMembership* OR (winlog.event_data.Payload:*get\-aduser* AND winlog.event_data.Payload:*\-f\ * AND winlog.event_data.Payload:*\-pr\ * AND winlog.event_data.Payload:*DoesNotRequirePreAuth*) OR (winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:*get\-aduser* AND winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:*\-f\ * AND winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:*\-pr\ * AND winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:*DoesNotRequirePreAuth*))`
